description: Try our easy to follow White Chocolate Crackles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chocolate treats,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Christmas,Vegetarian,Egg free,Chocolate,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert
name: White Chocolate Crackles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut three 20cm squares of baking paper. Fold each in half to form a triangle, then cut along the fold to form six triangles. Shape to form cones and staple to hold in place. Sit each in a tall coffee mug or glass.

Combine rice bubbles and coconut in a large bowl. Place 150g of the white chocolate and the vegetable shortening solid cooking block in a small heatproof bowl. Sit over a saucepan of simmering water, ensuring the bowl doesnâ€™t touch the water. Stir with a metal spoon until melted and smooth. Pour into rice bubble mixture and stir until well combined.
Spoon mixture into prepared cones, ensuring some of the mixture goes right into the point of the cone. Smooth surface. Chill for 30 minutes or until set.
Remove paper and lightly dust with icing sugar.
